title: My University had reset there Servers. Can i have my Low Priority Queue forgiven?
body: I go to school at Tennessee Tech and they had reset there servers. There internet was down while i was in the middle of a game. There was no way for me to know so it is not my fault. Is it possible to have my Low Priority Queue forgiven. Please let me know soon you can contact me through here or my email echivarre.mark@gmail.com

replies.body:
Unfortunately, regardless of the reason for the disconnection, it doesn't change the fact that your absence negatively impacts **everyone** in the match. This is a big reason as to why the system treats all disconnections equally and why we're unable to modify Leaverbuster penalties for any reason.

For more information on this system, check out our [**Leaverbuster FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ). If you have any other questions, don't hesitate to ask.
